name: ast-stripper
description: Strip method bodies from source code files

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm test || true
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A src
scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('tree-sitter-java'); require('tree-sitter-go'); require('tree-sitter-python'); require('tree-sitter-php'); require('tree-sitter-cpp'); require('tree-sitter-javascript'); require('tree-sitter-typescript'); require('tree-sitter-c'); require('tree-sitter-c-sharp'); require('tree-sitter-rust'); require('tree-sitter-kotlin'); require('tree-sitter-swift'); require('tree-sitter-ruby'); } catch(e) { console.error('Error loading tree-sitter languages:', e); process.exit(1); }"

author: Hongyu
